Nestjs - 6. AXIOS 통신

Written on June 13th, 2022 by zaimy

6. AXIOS 통신

1) 설치

yarn add axios
yarn add @nestjs/axios

2) Nest 기본구성

import { HttpService } from '@nestjs/axios';

const a = await lastValueFrom(this.httpService.get(url));
console.log(a.data);
Feel free to share!
